headline.main: SURRENDERED DATA LINKED TO CONGRESS; Grand Jury at Capital Gets Franked Envelopes Issued to 7 Senate and House Members

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 25 -- Bundles of franked envelopes used by members of Congress for their mail and discovered at the offices of the Make-Europe-Pay-War-Debts and Islands-for-War-Debts Committees, are part of the evidence considered in a grand jury investigation of Nazi agents in the United States, it was asserted today.
abstract: Denies connection with Nazi-linked Make Eur Pay War Debts and Islands for War Debts coms
